Class LevelUpConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.LevelUpConnection

  • @ThreadSafe
@LevelUpApi(contract=DRAFT)
public final class LevelUpConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for interacting with the LevelUp web service API.
